```{r, include=FALSE}
set.seed(1)
library(ergm)
library(StartNetwork)
library(parallel)
cl <- parallel::makeCluster(parallel::detectCores())

n = 40
nsim = 1000
nsim_new = 5000
```

```{r test1}
ergm_test <- ergm::simulate_formula(network::network(n, directed = FALSE) ~ gwdegree(2, fixed = TRUE), coef = 3, nsim = nsim)

ergm_test <- summary(ergm_test ~ gwdegree(2, fixed = TRUE))

x = mech_net_gwdegree_n(1, n, 1)
sn_init = sort(as.numeric(igraph::degree(x)))

input <- plyr::alply(t(replicate(6,sn_init)), 1)
sn_test <- parallel::parLapply(cl, input, ergm_simulator, sum_stat = StartNetwork::gwdegree, loops = nsim_new, theta = 3, alpha = 2)

# sn_test <- ergm_simulator(sn_init, Sgwdegree , 5000, 3, alpha = 2)

sn_test <- unlist(sn_test)

plot(density(ergm_test))
lines(density(sn_test[-c(1:1000)]), col = "red")
```

```{r test2}
ergm_test <- ergm::simulate_formula(network::network(n, directed = FALSE) ~ gwdegree(2, fixed = TRUE), coef = -1, nsim = nsim)

ergm_test <- summary(ergm_test ~ gwdegree(2, fixed = TRUE))

x = mech_net_gwdegree_n(1, n, 1)
sn_init = sort(as.numeric(igraph::degree(x)))

input <- plyr::alply(t(replicate(6,sn_init)), 1)
sn_test <- parallel::parLapply(cl, input, ergm_simulator, sum_stat = StartNetwork::gwdegree, loops = nsim_new, theta = -1, alpha = 2)

# sn_test <- ergm_simulator(sn_init, Sgwdegree , 5000, 3, alpha = 2)

sn_test <- unlist(sn_test)

plot(density(ergm_test))
lines(density(sn_test[-c(1:1000)]), col = "red")
```
